Author: shuttly
Text: Not weird at all; when I lost “joy” in b/p I felt like I was mourning the loss of a friend... it has been a coping mechanism for you and now, while still a possibility, just doesn’t do it like it used to. It is okay to have feelings about that, even though that might seem odd or weird to you. What coping mechanisms are you exploring now that you’ve lost this one? Hope you will feel better soon 💕
